description:
Havok is introducing a new pricing structure aimed at making its solutions more accessible to smaller and indie game development studios. Under the new pricing structure, game studios with budgets up to $20 million able to leverage technologies from Havok for a one-time fee of $50,000 per game: This new structure marks a departure from... Read more »

The post Havok intros affordable pricing for indie game development studios appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Havok intros affordable pricing for indie game development studios
